definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: humility:—Pr 15:33 + 3 t.; [[עַנְוׇה־]] (contr. because of Maqqeph, see Br:Mp) Ps 45:5; [[עֶנְוָֽתְְ]] Ps 18:36 (= [[עֲנׁתְְ]] 2Sa 22:36 v.I. [[ענה]]; rd. [[עֶזְרָֽתְח]] Ol We);—
humility, meekness Ps 45:5 (dub.), Pr 15:33, Pr 18:12, Pr 22:4, Zep 2:3 (prob. gloss, v. We Now).
